doc.title: Cheek to Cheek
doc.plot: A loosely, very loosely connected tale about white guys hooking up with black guys (Afro-Americans.) First a guy calls Eric to fix his dishwasher. Travis the roommate returns. Then Eric arrives and they all have sex. Second, there's a guy on the bed in underwear while Jones washes up. Because of Jones's early job tomorrow, they have sex right then. Third Chad calls gay sex ad (1-900-Black-Male). They have sex. Fourth, guy on futon needs massage. Jones is there after work, so they have sex.
